content: To be clear, the way that outing is portrayed on the show isn’t murky in the slightest. The Tribal Council began with routine strategizing, then took a turn for the shocking: Jeff Varner told host Jeff Probst, “There is a deception here. Deception on levels, Jeff, these guys don’t even understand,” then turned to tribemate Zeke Smith and asked him, “Why haven’t you told anyone you’re transgender?”
